text:
SYRACUSE UNIVERSITY
SYRACUSE 10, NEW YORK
RADIO AND TELEVISION CENTER
Noveaiber 22, 1957
Dr. Eaymond D. Cheydleur
University Broadcasting Services
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Ray:
Belatedly, let me express my thanks for
the kind words In your letter of October 30.
When one gets Involved In anything, he's never
sure how others will react, so It's good to
know your reactions.
As I am personally Involved with an E.T.E.C.
research project, whose purpose Is to evaluate
the effect of a series of kinescope programs on
Its audience, I’m tied up from now until next
summer. But I have acquainted our new class of
graduate students with the N.A.E.B. research
grants, and hope • If I am as successful as
last year - to have one or two of them come up
with a project worthy of N.A.E.B.'s attention
and support.
You'll hear from me If I'm lucky.
Cordially,
I rs, Jr,
